thread.section_title: Centauro Rent a Car opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Centauro Rent a Car | centauro.net
thread.title: Mr MP
thread.title_full: Centauro Rent a Car evaluado por Mr MP

author: Mr MP
title: Mr MP
text:
we rented a car in Malaga airport in March 2017. Although we didn't find any representatives in the meeting point - at airport's information we were advised to look for a mini bus near the entrance to Terminal 2 where we found a mini bus which just arrived. It took just 5 minutes to get to Centauro's depot and in few minutes (to sign some paperwork) we had a car.
Friendly and efficient service, would definitely use this service again!
Would recommend to spend some £££ more for Smart insurance directly via Centauro webpage, not a third party to avoid any misunderstandings.
